About

Hi, I am Miguel Mota.

I have about 4 years of experience in web development, currently focusing on client and server-side JavaScript. At the moment I am working on the front-end, building web applications for MarketShare, Inc., a predictive marketing analytics company.

I love doing what I do, and everyday I'm exploring new challenges. This flying lawnmower is my inspiration.

What is Moogs?

Moogs is my alias on the interwebs.

About the site

This site is built with jekyll, a static site generator in Ruby. I will ocasionally express thoughts and findings which I find worthy of sharing.

Give credit where credit is due

The icons you see are from Font Awesome and the home page social icons are from Simple Icons.
